Principles and Techniques of Data Science

UC Berkeley, Summer 2020

Suraj Rampure

suraj.rampure@berkeley.edu

Allen Shen

allenshen5@berkeley.edu

See the Calendar to see the scheduling of our weekly events. Also, see the Syllabus for a detailed explanation of how each course component will work this summer, given that the course is being taught entirely online. All Zoom links for live events are posted on Piazza.

It should also be noted that the linked textbook readings are purely supplementary.
